title: Zimbabwe Deposit Interest Rate
description: Deposit Interest Rate in Zimbabwe remained unchanged at 92 percent in September from 92 percent in August of 2022. Deposit Interest Rate in Zimbabwe averaged 21.23 percent from 1980 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 203.38 percent in December of 2006 and a record low of 3.52 percent in December of 1980. In Zimbabwe, deposit rates depict the range of rates quoted by banks. In May 2017 banks have adjusted their costs of holding deposits following the call by the Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe to reduce lending rates. This page includes a chart with historical data for Deposit Interest Rate in Zimbabwe.
author: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe
